Name: Orbit VR
About the game: Orbit is a space battle game where you blast your way through the universe in epic battles full of insane destruction. Planets can be destroyed one chunk at a time or slowly pulled apart by a black hole. Over 400 re-playable levels with black holes, turbo levels, crazy orbits, retro levels, survival, death cubes, and boss fights all adding to the challenge. There are numerous weapons ranging from primitive darts to futuristic energy beams. Use shields or defensive weapons to protect your planet and powerful Rigs that inflict extra damage. If all else fails, use the Sun's Mega Shot to destroy the entire solar system. Build up your arsenal and prepare for destruction.
